page.title: 17The Summer Spectacular
page.content: The Summer Spectacular is an annual event held at Heron Brook Middle School, Gnosall. The main event this year was a pike and musket drill and a skirmish by members of Colonel Richard Bagot's Sealed Knot Charity. They fired a cannon which was very loud and some muskets which weren't quite so loud. There were many other attractions including a traction engine and trailer,a tug-of-war contest between local pubs and clubs, radio-controlled model cars, tombola, refreshments and many games and stalls. The school orchestra played and there were pony rides. It was a lovely sunny afternoon and the event was very well supported by the local community. It was a very successful day. Everyone had a good time and over 1000 pounds was raised for the school.
